summary.responsibilities: Improve the reliability of modern software applications using fuzz testing techniques.
summary.collaboration: The program is sponsored by Singapore's Cybersecurity Agency as part of the National Cybersecurity R&D programme.
summary.eligibility: Applicants need to have a PhD degree or should be submitting PhD thesis soon.
summary.description: The positions will be part of a grant sponsored by Singapore's Cybersecurity Agency as part of the National Cybersecurity R&D programme named 'Fuzz Testing'.
summary.program_highlights: The program involves research projects that focus on advanced testing and analysis of concurrent/distributed/stateful software, including kernel software.
topics_of_interest: agentic AI based automated program repair
summary.academic_reputation: The Computer Science Department of NUS enjoys a high degree of academic reputation.
